description: FLIRT-based image registration tool with additional options for brain extraction and weighting masks

output_basename.title: Output Basename
output_basename.description: Output basename for the results (e.g. subject10rawT1_to_std_sub)

debug_flag.title: Debug Flag
debug_flag.description: Debug mode: don't delete intermediate files

inweight_flag.title: Inweight Mask
inweight_flag.description: Use a weighting mask on the first registration

strucweight_mask.title: Structure Weighting Mask
strucweight_mask.description: Use a specific structure weighting mask (in standard space) for an optional third-stage registration step (e.g. maskimage.nii.gz)

cort_flag.title: Cortical Weighting Mask
cort_flag.description: Use a weighting mask of the whole brain on the first registration for specific models

cost_function.title: Cost Function
cost_function.description: Specify the cost function to be used by all FLIRT calls
